title: U.S. Space Force to step up protection of satellite ground systems in the wake of Russia’s cyber attacks
summary: Lt. Gen. Saltzman said one lesson from the cyber attacks in Ukraine is that the main targets are not the satellites but the ground systems and user equipment

title: Starliner ready to try again with OFT-2 launch
summary: Nine months after valve issues caused its previous launch attempt to be scrubbed, Boeing’s Starliner spacecraft stands ready to carry out its Orbital Flight Test 2 mission which will lift off atop a United Launch Alliance Atlas V rocket Thursday. OFT-2 is set to depart Space Launch Complex 41 at Cape Canaveral at 6:54:36 p.m. EDT (22:54 UTC), bound for the International Space Station (ISS).

title: Some Tesla customers are now expecting a 2-year wait for their new Model X

title: NASA, Partners Offer Global View of Environmental Changes
summary: Continuing the collaboration that produced the COVID-19 Earth Observing Dashboard in 2020, NASA and its international partners in Europe and Japan have combined the collective scientific power of their Earth-observing satellite data in expanding the online resource to document a broad array of planet-wide changes in the environment and human societ

title: Today’s the day when Boeing’s Starliner takes to the skies. Probably
summary: "The teams are ready. Boeing is ready. ULA is ready."
